description: List the resource scans from newest to oldest. By default it will return up to 10 resource scans.

nested_items.name: ResourceScanId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource scan.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the resource scan status, providing more information if a failure happened.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time that the resource scan was started.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time that the resource scan was finished.

nested_items.name: PercentageCompleted
nested_items.description: The percentage of the resource scan that has been completed.

nested_items.name: ScanType
nested_items.description: The scan type that has been completed.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the request doesn't return all the remaining results, NextToken is set to a token. To retrieve the next set of results, call ListResourceScans again and use that value for the NextToken parameter. If the request returns all results, NextToken is set to an empty string.
